original_title: Madonna: Live Earth Concert at London
overview: Madonna released the song "Hey You" for the Live Earth series of concerts. The song was available as a free download during its first week of release. She also performed "Ray of Light", "La Isla Bonita" (with Eugene HÃ¼tz and Sergey Ryabtsev of Gogol Bordello) and "Hung Up" at the London Live Earth concert too.
title: Madonna: Live Earth Concert at London
